subject: #SSN2239
description_text:
Hello,

few days ago, I made my order for Simsonn Plus x pedals under order
number #SSN2239, but till now I have not received anything about shipping
the order.

I just wanted to check was my order was well received, and if everything is
ok?

Best regards!
Vlado Vrlika

conversations.body_text: Hi Vlado Vrlika,    We apologize for the delay. Due to stock shortages at our warehouse in Germany, we plan to wait until around the 11th for new goods to arrive at the German warehouse before shipping your order. This will help avoid customs duties. Since we have always shipped goods to Croatia via our German warehouse, we are unsure whether shipping directly from China would result in unusually high taxes. If you need the items urgently, we can ship them to you via UPS. Please let us know your preference as soon as possible.

Hello,

First, I want to thank you for your fast reply!
Everything is ok, I just wanted to check if the whole order process went as
it should!

I can also confirm that if sent from China, it would result in additional
costs (customs clearance and tax).
It is always the case for shipments above 160€ sent by DHL, UPS, FEDEX; in
other cases, sometimes it goes "under the radar" and it is not affected
(but not always).
My background is also in global logistics, so I know it from experience.
?

Once again, thank you, and I'm looking forward to using your products in
the future!

Best regards!
Vlado Vrlika

On Fri, Aug 8, 2025 at 10:56 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Vlado Vrlika,    The latest inventory from our German warehouse has arrived, but the Plus X P2-H2 / Silver / Baseplate you purchased is still out of stock. Can we replace it with the Plus X P2-H2 / Black / Baseplate version for you?

Hello, yes black will also be ok.

Thank you!

pon, 11. kol 2025. 17:54 service@simsonn.com
​  Okay, thank you for your confirmation. We have arranged for your shipment!

Hello,

Recently I bought Simsonn Plus X pedals and I'm really happy with them.
I was just on Simsonn's website checking the VAM Pro set of two haptic
motors with power supply and mounting brackets, but when I went to check
out, it added 27,10$ of taxes to the price.

I have received my pedals from Germany, and there were no additional taxes
to the price. Is there a way to do it the same way for the haptic set?

Best regards!
Vlado

On Mon, Aug 11, 2025 at 5:59 PM service@simsonn.com
